# <a name="organize-your-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="00c2f-102">Organizovanje e-pošte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="00c2f-102">Organize your email</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="00c2f-103">U programu Outlook na vebu možete da koristite komande kao što je **Čišćenje** i **Premeštanje** da biste automatski izbrisali ili premestili poruke od određenog pošiljaoca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="00c2f-103">In Outlook on the web, you can use commands like **Sweep** and **Move to** to automatically delete or move messages from a particular sender.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="00c2f-104">Ove komande se pojavljuju iznad liste poruka kada izaberete poruku u prijemnom poštanskom sandučetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="00c2f-104">These commands appear above the message list when you select a message in your inbox.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="00c2f-105">**Sti**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="00c2f-105">**Sweep**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="00c2f-106">omogućava vam da brzo izbrišete poruke u prijemnom poštanskom sandučetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="00c2f-106">lets you quickly delete messages in your inbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="00c2f-107">Možete automatski da izbrišete sve dolazne e-poruke od tog pošiljaoca, zadržite samo najnoviju e-poruku i da izbrišete ostalo ili da izbrišete e-poštu stariju od 10 dana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="00c2f-107">You can automatically delete all incoming email from that sender, keep only the latest email and delete the rest, or delete email older than 10 days.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="00c2f-108">**Premeštanje na**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="00c2f-108">**Move to**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="00c2f-109">omogućava vam da poruku premestite u drugu fasciklu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="00c2f-109">lets you move a message a specific message to another folder.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="00c2f-110">Da biste saznali više, pogledajte članak [rad sa fasciklama sa porukama u programu Outlook na vebu](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="00c2f-110">To learn more, see [Working with message folders in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span></span>
